item.title: Django Unchained
item.description: This is about a slave who was freed but a government official and goes on a search for his wife who was beaten and taken to a well known slave land.

item.title: Silver Linings Playbook
item.description: This is about two people who are recovering addicts. They fall in love even though it was unlikely and they go through obstacles along the way.

item.title: Beautiful Creatures
item.description: This is about a teenage girl who is destined to become evil because of her family lineage but she falls in love with a handsome young man and her family does everything they can to tear them apart so she can become the evil nasty creature she was destined to be.

item.title: Snitch
item.description: This is about a man who's son is put in jail for a crime he didn't commit. The father goes on a search to help uncover the truth in this drama and action filled movie. Dwayne Johnson is starring in this 4 star movie.
